MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the PR9 postcode area of Southport. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:38am.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site have needed to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 3am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:36pm on 12th November 2020
